short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hellonotify.com - Seamlessly integrate your Whatsapp messaging accounts with your applications and services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your communication to the next level with our all-in-one Whatsapp Hellonotify Extension. Designed for businesses looking to automate and optimize their messaging processes, this plugin allows seamless integration with your CRM, website, or any system through a simple API connection. Whether you're managing customer relationships, handling sales inquiries, or following up with leads, this tool will revolutionize how you connect.

Advanced Features:
ðŸ‘‰ Send Text Messages via API: Easily send personalized text messages through WhatsApp using your system's API.

ðŸ‘‰ Multimedia Support: Share videos, images, and PDFs effortlessly through the API, enhancing your customer interactions.

ðŸ‘‰ Contact Unlimited Numbers: No more restrictions â€“ reach as many contacts as you need with unlimited message sending.

ðŸ‘‰ Real-Time Status Updates: Get live updates on message statuses (Sent, Delivered, Read) via Webhook, ensuring transparency and tracking.

ðŸ‘‰ Auto-Reply Feature: Set up custom auto-replies to respond instantly to incoming messages, improving response times and customer satisfaction.

Benefits:

ðŸ‘‰ Seamless Integration: Connect your CRM or website effortlessly with WhatsApp, allowing you to send messages directly from your system without manual work.

ðŸ‘‰ Boost Productivity: Automate messaging processes, freeing up your team's time to focus on high-priority tasks.

ðŸ‘‰ Enhance Customer Engagement: Keep customers informed with timely messages, status updates, and quick replies to their queries.

ðŸ‘‰ Scalable Solution: Whether you're a small business or an enterprise, this extension can handle high message volumes, ensuring you stay connected with all your contacts.

This extension is a game-changer for businesses that rely on WhatsApp for communication. Automate, scale, and track your messaging like never before!
